main: ^Oh, you look like a smart guy...I think we can help each other.

^No, thank you. I'm not interested right now.
steal: ^I have something that I think belogns to you. A piece of a device. If you would bring me that big gem from the upper left room we can make a little exchange.

trade: ^If anyone ask, we don't know each other right?
